page.title: 04BELBROUGHTON CHURCH HALL
page.content: {Belbroughton Church Hall}has nine regular users, either on a weekly or monthly basis: {WEEKLY:}Yoga; More the Merrier; Toddler Group; Christian Youth Fellowship. {MONTHLY:}Womens' Institute; Horticultural Society; Spinning Club; Art Club. Old Tyme Dancing Club meets fortnightly and the History Society every two months. It is also used by other village organisations for jumble sales and parties and the Church uses the hall for their functions but pays no fee. The hall is also used for wedding receptions, birthday parties,etc.
